title: Petrified Forest National Park: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners             Partners       Cooperating Association The Petrified Forest Museum Association is the park's cooperating association, providing funding, staff, and supplies. This non-profit organization also manages two bookstores in the park, located in the Painted Desert Visitor Center and Rainbow Forest Museum.   Join Our Friends Park friends groups assist parks in supporting programs and projects. Learn how the Friends of Petrified Forest is helping and how you can become a member.  Petrified Forest Field Institute Petrified Forest Field Institute (PFFI) is a program of our cooperating association, Petrified Forest Museum Association (PFMA). PFFI is proud to offer guided hiking tours lead by world class guides and field experts that explore a variety of fun and compelling subjects. Classes and other information can be found on their website.  Â     Learn more about NPS partnerships like the National Park Foundation, plus how we support communities and how we receive support from communities service-wide.
